fr.lip6.jkernelmachines.classifier

Class NystromLSSVM<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.lip6.jkernelmachines.classifier.NystromLSSVM<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Classifier<T>, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class NystromLSSVM<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements Classifier<T>
    This classifier is a fast approximate SVM classifier using the Nystrom kernel for project non-linearly the samples in a subspace in which a linear classifier is learned.
    Author:
    picard
